title: Special Sunday Service - True Parents' Birthday Celebration
content: Join us for a special celebration service honoring the birthday of our True Parents, Rev. Sun Myung Moon and Dr. Hak Ja Han Moon. The service will include special performances, testimonies, and a community feast.

title: Weekly Family Pledge Service
content: Every Sunday at 5:00 AM, we gather for our weekly Family Pledge service. All families are encouraged to participate in this meaningful tradition.

title: Youth Workshop: Building Character
content: A special workshop for our youth focusing on character development and spiritual growth. Registration is now open for ages 13-25.
